fields.name: Enable

fields.name: CHAN0_INT_ST

fields.name: CHAN1_INT_ST
fields.description: Channel 1 (ap_ready) Interrupt Status. 0 = No Channel 1 interrupt, 1 = Channel 1 interrupt.
